message: The medic examines the injured knight. 'I can help, but first prove you can be trusted.'

options.message: The medic prepares a series of medical questions.

message: Impressed by your knowledge, the medic offers you a healing potion before treating the knight.

options.message: You gratefully accept the powerful healing potion.

message: The medic treats the knight's wounds and agrees to join your cause.

options.message: With your new allies, you make your way to the resistance base.
